short_notes: * Transition to ROL with input SIT.F

name: Bear Roll
notes:
* Alternative input: FC.3+4 or FDFA.f
* Transition to ROL
* Transition to HBS with input ROL.D or ROL.3+4
* Becomes special mid attack during Heat (partially uses remaining Heat time)
short_notes:
* Alternative input: FC.3+4 or FDFA.f
* Transition to ROL
* Transition to HBS with input ROL.D or ROL.3+4
* Becomes special mid attack during Heat (partially uses remaining Heat time)

name: Bear's Bite
notes:
* Throw break: 1 or 2
* Opponent status on hit: FUFT
short_notes:
* Throw break: 1 or 2
* Opponent status on hit: FUFT

name: Bear Hug
notes:
* Throw break: 1 or 2
* Opponent status on hit: FUFT
* Side switch on hit
short_notes:
* Throw break: 1 or 2
* Opponent status on hit: FUFT
* Side switch on hit

name: Swing Swung
notes:
* Throw break: none
* Opponent status on hit: FUFA
short_notes:
* Throw break: none
* Opponent status on hit: FUFA

name: Bear Toss
notes:
* Removes Recoverable Health
* Spike
* Throw break: none
* Opponent status on hit: FUFA
short_notes:
* Removes Recoverable Health
* Throw break: none
* Opponent status on hit: FUFA

name: Bear Slam
notes:
* Throw break: 1
* Spike
* Opponent status on hit: FUFT
short_notes:
* Throw break: 1
* Opponent status on hit: FUFT

name: Choke Slam
notes:
* Throw break: 2
* Opponent status on hit: FUFT off axis
short_notes:

* Opponent status on hit: FUFT off axis

name: Rock'n Roll Circus
notes:
* Throw break: 1+2
* Opponent status on hit: FUFA
* Side switch on hit
short_notes:
* Throw break: 1+2
* Opponent status on hit: FUFA
* Side switch on hit

name: Headbutt
notes:
* Throw break: 1+2
* Balcony Break
* Opponent status on hit: FUFT
